Yakumo_Yukari_Pink.NAME: A Desperate Friend
DIALOG: This time, I must save you.
Please cooperate with me, so I can cleanse you of your corruption!

YukariShowEffect.NAME: Steps:
DIALOG: Apply any amount of #yMoribund when the enemy has at least #b10 #yMoribund.
Gain any #yBlock when you have at least #b20 #yBlock.
Gain any amount of #ySakura and/or #yButterfly when you have at least #b3 #yPhantasm.

Yakumo_Yukari_friendly_Pink.NAME: A Stalwart Friend
DIALOG: We managed to buy quite some time...
It can't even touch you. Brilliant!
